title: "Discord Discourse" - Discussin' Topics from Our Discord!
itunes:title: "Discord Discourse" - Discussin' Topics from Our Discord!
description:
This week we address topics that have been raised on our discord! From the flying PC controversy to augmenting 5e with other systems, these all come straight from the fans! Special shoutout to TheGiftOfGabes, Chelsea, Tobester, Dweller42, Nandor (Donevon), and Eldritchpuffin for supplying this week's topics! 

The horrific 1e and 2e Aarakocra images:
https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/forgottenrealms/images/5/50/Fiend_Folio_1e_-_Aarakocra_-_p8.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/233?cb=20150109150229

https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/forgottenrealms/images/b/ba/Monstrous_manual_2e_-_Aarakocra_-_p5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/248?cb=20150109150202

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! .

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
